data.description: Package providing simple PDF layout elements
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The package is intendet to provide simple and not too complicated
    layout elements for creating PDF documents with PDF::API2 by Alfred
    Reibenschuh. All PDF generating packages I found on CPAN provide
    basic elements to create PDF files, lacking of components of a
    higher level of abstraction (tables, layout managers, advanced text
    formatting), so I actually decided to call my package PDF::Layout.
    But this sounds rather like the ultimate collection of layout
    classes, covering all kinds of subjects, which is not what
    PDF::PlainLayout was intended to do. PDF::Layout::Lite requires the
    PDF::Layout name space already to exist, which is also not the case.
